Sentence.value: - If the biopsy is done without another procedure, the catheter is most often placed through a vein in the neck and then carefully threaded into the heart.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: - If the [[biopsy|C0005558]] is done without another [[procedure|C0184661]], the catheter is most often placed through a [[vein|C0042449]] in the [[neck|C0027530]] and then carefully threaded into the heart.

Sentence.value: - Once the catheter is in position, a special device with small jaws on the tip is used to remove small pieces of tissue from the heart muscle.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: - Once the catheter is in position, a special device with [[small jaws|C0025990]] on the tip is used to remove small pieces of tissue from the [[heart muscle|C0027061]].

Sentence.value: This procedure is routinely done after heart transplantation to watch for signs of rejection.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: This procedure is routinely done after [[heart transplantation|C0018823]] to watch for [[signs|C0311392]] of rejection.

Sentence.value: Your doctor may also order this procedure if you have signs of: - Alcoholic cardiomyopathy - Cardiac amyloidosis - Cardiomyopathy - Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy - Idiopathic cardiomyopathy - Ischemic cardiomyopathy - Myocarditis - Peripartum cardiomyopathy - Restrictive cardiomyopathy
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Your [[doctor|C0031831]] may also order this procedure if you have [[signs|C0311392]] of: - Alcoholic cardiomyopathy - Cardiac amyloidosis - Cardiomyopathy - Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy - Idiopathic cardiomyopathy - Ischemic cardiomyopathy - Myocarditis - Peripartum cardiomyopathy - Restrictive cardiomyopathy
